meanings.definition: To blend or puree food into a liquid form.
meanings.sent1: Mom is liquidizing the soup to make it easier for you to eat.
meanings.sent2: The chef is liquidizing the ingredients to make a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent3: The blender went crazy, liquidizing everything in its path!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to have the effect of liquidizing all tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The storm was so strong, it was liquidizing the food on the picnic table.
